body.p:
Aberystwyth, Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru: The National Library of Wales
Peniarth MS 330A. Statutes, Magna carta om.; begins Carta forestae, section xviii. ‘Small 4to. Volume.’
Provenance: Inscr. ‘WWE Wynne 1829,’ f. ir; olim Ancient Peniarth MS 27.st
Bibliography: HMC (2nd, appx.), p. 105 (‘Magna Charta’ reported extant); NLW Handlist, I, p. 1.
